ing: 2 (8 ounce) cans whole mushrooms, drained, liquid reserved from one can
des: "Mushrooms simmered with Burgundy wine, onions, and beef broth make for a tasty side dish with almost no preparation at all."
ins: In a small saucepan, simmer the onion for 15 minutes in beef broth. Add mushrooms, reserved liquid, and wine, and simmer another 15 minutes, or until liquid is reduced by half. Serve warm.
